chunk:
Green Beauty Cosmetics Mature Skin Cream

Brand: Green Beauty Cosmetics

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Beeswax, Theobroma Cacao (Cacao) Seed Butter, Tocopherol

d Butter, Tocopherol, Vanilla Planifolia (Vanilla) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Oil, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass)

Directions: : Apply to face on top of moisturizer. Leave some shine. Use as a primer under foundation.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity,
